topic.title: Bible4u
topic.body:
This project is dedicated in sharing the Bible message, in the clearnet as well as in the darknet (through Tor, I2P, Freenet and Zeronet networks). Our mission is to provide a various Bible translation in the areas, where an internet censorship is present and also be the light within the darknet.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BiBLE4U2fLzhr5i2nt1Uxz57CzWktdTSv/
